text: Deafening silence from certain media regarding blame for Murray & Roberts bridge collapse.
A truck will be blamed for this #BridgeCollapse, wait & see how #MurrayAndRoberts absolve themselves. Poor blackdriver will take the fall.
Bridge collapse: Murray & Roberts stock price falls almost 10% http://www.htxt.co.za/2015/10/15/bridge-collapse-murray-roberts-stock-price-falls-almost-10/ … pic.twitter.com/XBWJ5MK6ec
